title: Comical Demon Mask
text: This simple ink painting depicts a Kyōgen mask used in the comic skits interspersed in Noh theater. Gradients in the brush strokes describe the crevassed features of the Buaku character, a comical demon whose sheepish grin conveys his docile character.
description: smiling comical mask face near lower right side with exaggerated features; approx 2/3 of the image area is blank
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
